entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Goderich
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:52 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Goderich 04:00 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
Temperature: -5.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -7.5°C
Wind: W 23 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries or snow squalls. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Flurries or snow squalls early this morning. Blowing snow this morning and early this afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 early this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 19 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
